section.heading: Statute of limitations.
section.text: An action for misappropriation must be brought within 3 years after the misappropriation is discovered or, by the exercise of reasonable diligence, should have been discovered. For the purposes of this section, a continuing misappropriation constitutes a single claim.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Trade Secrets Act.
